title:
Walker's Razor Slim Earmuffs; Dynamic shooting range high-definition speakers; sound-activated compression reaction of 0.02 seconds with independent volume controls;
Noise reduction 23 dB; 2 omnidirectional microphones; audio input jack; recessed volume control knobs; 2 AAA batteries (included); size: 8.10 x 4.60 x 10.60 inches; weight: 0.98 pounds
descriptions:
Meet Walker’s Razor Slim Earmuffs—the sleek, high-performance hearing protection built for shooters who demand clarity, comfort, and confidence.

- Razor-fast protection: Sound-activated compression reacts in just 0.02 seconds to help guard your hearing the instant a shot is fired.
- Hear what matters: Dual omnidirectional microphones and high-definition speakers amplify range commands and ambient sounds with crisp, directional clarity.
- Tuned to you: Independent, recessed volume control knobs let you fine-tune amplification in each ear without accidental bumps.
- Serious noise reduction: NRR 23 dB helps cut harsh blast noise while maintaining situational awareness.
- All-day comfort: A slim, low-profile design with a comfortable metal wire-frame headband reduces bulk and hot spots. Foldable for easy pack-and-go storage.
- Range-ready durability: Composite, sound-dampening housing built to handle regular use at the range.
- Plug in and focus: Onboard 3.5 mm audio input jack for music, training apps, or comms.
- Power included: Runs on 2 AAA batteries (included), so you’re ready right out of the box.

Specs at a glance:
- Reaction time: 0.02 seconds
- NRR: 23 dB
- Mics: 2 omnidirectional
- Controls: Independent, recessed volume knobs
- Power: 2 AAA batteries (included)
- Size: 8.10 x 4.60 x 10.60 inches
- Weight: 0.98 lb

Stay protected, stay aware, and stay sharp. Upgrade your range experience with Walker’s Razor Slim Earmuffs today.
